comments.comment: DGL exploits th._sparse_coo_tensor_unsafe in 0.4.1 which is significantly faster than sparse_coo_tensor. Unfortunately it is removed in 1.0 release, which is by the same time DGL is released. We will follow-up and fix that in a patch. Meanwhile, you could try using 0.4.1 temporarily if you want to.
